title: Rock Band Video Game UI
content:
Hi, I'm looking for the Rock Band UI font. Here's a sample used on their store website, [www.rockbandstore.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100928120322/http:/www.rockbandstore.com/ "www.rockbandstore.com")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100928120322im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rockbandfont_4233.png)

Thank you!
author: sudormrf
